name: Collonil 1909 Supreme Wax
description:
Premium conditioning and waterproofing spray 

Gives protection to Nappa and Calf leathers as well as treated leathers such as waxed, antique, grained and greased leathers

Enriched with Cedar oil and natural waxes to care the leather and lend shine to the texture

Collonil products are specially formulated to be as Eco-friendly as possible. The base material for making the products is always wax. It's then mixed with aromatic essences Aloe, Almond, or Cedar oils.

Spray several times from a distance of 20 cm. Allow to dry and buff. Use regularly. 


200ml/6.76oz
Made in Germany

name: Collonil 1909 Supreme Protect
description:
Premium conditioning and waterproofing spray 

Can be used on all suedes or cordovan shell;  on fashionable leather goods with metallic finish or of combination; and on large goods such as jackets, belts or bags

Achieves optimal protection against dirt penetration, snow and water marks ,while prolonging the durability of the leather and maintaining the look.

Spray several times from a distance of 20 cm. Allow to dry and buff.

200ml/6.76oz
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Waterstop Spray
description:
Waterproofing spray

Highly effective spray for smooth leather

Recommended by British luxury brand Mulberry to protect its bags,as it prevents against deeply engrained dirt ;Against stains due to water or snow; Also is with UV filters against colour fading caused by the sun. 

Achieves optimum waterproofing without blocking the pores of leather. Allows breathability. Use in conjunction with Creme de Luxe to keep leather supple. 

No smell and dries instantly.

Use Collonil Waterstop Spray only outdoors or in well-ventilated rooms. Spray leather goods beforehand three times from a distance of about 20 cm. Leave for about 20 minutes so that the spray can penetrate deep into the material. Regular application optimises the effect.

200ml/6.76oz
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Special Wax Spray
description:
Waterproofing spray

Protection for waxed and antique leathers as well as sensitive Nappa leather. 

Dirt-repellent; Water-resistant

Use only outdoors or in well-ventilated rooms.  Spray before use three times from a distance of about 20 cm. Leave the shoes for about 20 minutes so that the spray can penetrate deep into the uppers. Regular application optimises the effect.

Sprays are shipped to the US via Canada Post Expedited Parcel.

200ml
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Suede Spray
description:
Waterproofing and colour renewing spray

Collonil Nubuck & Velours(suede in German) Spray can be used on all kinds of Suede Leather, nubuck, sheepskin, or top grain suede that is split from leather.

Like Collonil Waterstop spray, but provides effective waterproofing to suede leather, at the same time, renewing colours of the napped surface. Long-lasting protection against wetness as well as dirt. 

Prevents snow and water stains and preserves the original looks especially in the Canadian Winter.

Ideal for sheepskin boots

Sprays are shipped to the US via Canada Post Expedited Parcel. 

200ml/6.76oz
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Exotic Spray
description:
Waterproofing Spray

Special protection spray for reptile leather and leather in exotic looks. 

Dirt and moisture repellent, conditions and activates colours.

Use only outdoors or in well-ventilated rooms. Spray beforehand three times from a distance of about 20 cm. Leave for about 20 minutes so that the spray can penetrate deep into the material. Regular application optimises the effect.

Shipped to the US and Canada via Canada Post Expedited Parcel. 

200ml/6.76oz
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Vario Spray
description:
Waterproofing Spray

Collonil Vario Spray waterproofs and conditions leather, metallic materials, perlato, synthetics, fur, stretch, felt and all material combinations.

Protects against deeply embedded dirt and moisture. Conditions and revives colours.

Use only outdoors or in well-ventilated rooms. Spray beforehand  three times from a distance of about 20 cm. Leave for about 20 minutes so that the spray can penetrate deep into the material. Regular application optimises the effect.

Shipped to the US and Canada via Canada Post Expedited Parcel. 

200ml/6.76oz
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Nanopro Spray(300ml)
description:
Waterproofing spray with Nano Tech

Innovative high-tech protection for all smooth leather, suede, nubuck and textiles.

Nano technology forms shield on textiles and leather fibers to make them highly resistant to water and stain, increasing waterproof ability by 20 percent. Moisture is rolled off from the shield of Nano spray. Yet allows the material to breathe. The grip of the material is preserved. 

Shake the can before use. Spray on thin layer. Let dry and repeat several times for best protection. Afterwards polish smooth leather if necessary. Regular use optimises protective effect.  

300ml
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Nano Complete(300ml)
description:
All-in-one spray(Cleaning, conditioning, and Waterproofing) 

All-purpose that is suitable for all materials

Collonil's innovative Nano Complete protects, nourishes and facilitates the cleaning of shoes of both leather as well as synthetic materials – All in One. This innovative product, incorporating nano technology, provides a long lasting protective film against moisture and dirt ,while cleaning and caring your fine leather goods.

Spray several times from a distance of 20 cm. Allow to dry and buff.



300ml
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Leather Gel (for Waterproofing)
description:
Waterproofing gel 

Suitable for smooth and suede leathers. 

Dirt and moisture repellent; conditioning and colour-activating.

Collonil Leather Gel is a waterproofing product as effective  as Collonil Waterstop Spray. However, it does has its edge on preserving print finish, whereas Waterstop Spray is better in protecting leather goods from Ultraviolet Rays.

Apply Gel evenly with brush or Collonil Polishing Cloth

Once dry buff suede or nubuck with NUBUCK BOX to restore the nap. For leather buff  with cloth when dry. 

230ml
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Leather Gel
description:
Waterproofing gel 

Gel in a jar

50ml/1.7oz
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Nubuk Box
description:
Foam rubber sponge 

For sheepskin and nubuck.

Use Collonil Clean and Care if stain is extensive and engrained. For mere spots, Collonil nubuck Box is handy to use. 

Gently rub marks with the crepe rubber side of Collonil Nubuck Box. Use its synthetic side to roughen the fibres ,in other words, to restore the nap. For better results , brush the suede in one direction.

Made in Germany

name: Collonil Soft Gum
description:
Soft cleaning rubber

Can be used on nappa leather; full grain leather; leather with fashionable finish, metallic finish, or patent coating

Handy for removing light spots or streaks. 

Gently rub the dirt with Soft Gum to remove it



Made in Germany

name: Collonil Suede Cleaning Block
description:
Cleaning rubber 

Especially for light suede leathers, ones that are spilts from leather

It can remove even the most resistant spots and greasy marks. 

Just rub Collonil Suede Cleaning Block on spots to remove the dirt. May use Collonil Clean and Care for large stains

Made in Germany

name: Collonil Leather Soap(Leather Cleaner)
description:
Cleaning Foam 

Effective cleaning foam for smooth leather, synthetics and rubber

Collonil Leather Soap cleans and conditions while returning grease to leather.

 
200ml 
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Soft Cleaner(Textile Cleaner)
description:
Special cleaner for textiles



200ml
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Clean and Care(All-purpose Cleaner)
description:
All-purpose cleaning foam

In the winter,can be used on boots and derbies in waxy leather, grained leather, oiled Suede, and nubuck ;In the summer, loafers, boat shoes, moccasins. You name it. 

Highly effective in removing stubborn stains such as snow stain, water stain, and salt stain.Cleans up at once even the engrained dirt. It's incredible how the most appalling dirt as shown in the photos to the right was removed after three times of brushing. Much more efficient than any Salt and Stain Remover on the market. In addition, it can be used all year around on all the shoes you have.

Best of all made from bamboo extract without propellants and solvents

Partner with our Horsehair Brush to give a fresh look to your shoes. highly recommend this product to anyone.

200ml 
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Reiniger(Special Cleaner)
description:
Special Cleaner 

To be used on smooth leather, suede or textiles

For removing greasy stain and oil stain

200ml
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Shampoo
description:
Special Cleaner

Cleans all materials thoroughly. 

Ready to use - no longer any laborious mixing necessary. Very effective due to the combination of highly intensive ingredients. 

Its sponge applicator absorbs the dirt well and ensures a very good cleaning result. With fresh scent. 

Test colourfastness before use. Simply press the sponge applicator repeatedly to create foam. Clean the material by using the bottom in a circling motion. Wash the dirty sponge applicator and/or repeat cleaning process. To finish rub the material with a moist cloth or sponge and allow to dry. 

75ml
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Whitener
description:
Cleaner and conditioner for lighter colours

Brightens up smooth leather and textiles shoes

Comes with a sponge applicator for easy application.

75ml
Made in Germany

name: Collonil 1909 Leather Lotion
description:
Premium conditioning lotion

Another conditioner from 1909 line, besides Cedar Oil as conditioner, it features Aloe Vera. This ingredient prevents the loss of moisture, therefore making leather supple for a long time while keeping it from drying out. 

Can used on all leathers, in particular leather jackets, purses and belts

1909 Leather Cream, with natural solvent, is ideal for gentle cleaning on leather shoes that get dirty easily.

1909 Supreme Creme de Luxe  has extra-pigment and natural waxes in addition to conditioner .It's great at reviving colour or covering scuff. 

As for 1909 Leather Lotion, its use is to provide long lasting suppleness to leather goods.


100ml
Made in Germany

name: Collonil 1909 Supreme Crème de Luxe Black
description:
Premium polishing cream

The goal of Collonil has been to provide quality products that are solvent-free and as eco-friendly as possible. The base material for making leather care products is always wax. It's then mixed with natural aromatic essenses such as Aloe, Almond, or Cedar oils.

Collonil 1909 Supreme Crème de Luxe Black(751) contains extra pigment than regular shoe cream for a range of application from covering scuff, reviving dried out  leather, to antiquing.

Cedar Oil for deep conditioning keeping the leather soft and supple

With quality waxes, this cream exclusively complements Collonil 1909 Wax Polish. An ordinary cream often has harmful substances like Paraffin or Silicone that would block the pores of leather. Instead, it has natural waxes that are selected to blend well with the latter.
 
Perfumed with hints of Cedar


Remove dust and dirt from leather by using 1909 Leather Cream before application. Apply 1909 Supreme Crème de Luxe sparingly onto the uppers with Dauber. Let Dry, buff.

100 ml 
Made in Germany

name: Collonil 1909 Supreme Crème de Luxe Neutral
description:
It's best to use neutral cream in preserving antiqued finish with a hue of colour

Creamy texture 

Great for softening "wet-white " leather, Aldehyde-tanned leather, which is widely used for soles, both insole and outsole, in entry level shoes. It will make them pliable immediately after a few coatings. There is nothing wrong with the process of tanning wet-white leather. It turns hide into leather in a short period of time, cutting the cost .But moisture doesn't get a chance to work into the leather. As a result, soles are stiff initially. A trick for anyone is to condition soles with deep-conditioning cream like 1909 Supreme Crème de Luxe Neutral  to make them pliable. We also recommend moisturizing the uppers on in the range after stripping their factory coating. 

100 ml 
Made in Germany

name: Collonil 1909 Supreme Crème de Luxe Dark Brown
description:
Extra pigment. Pigment is the re-colouring ingredient that is in a jar of shoe cream. It works into the uppers and restores the colour of shoes. Therefore great for covering scuffs ,which are inevitable to incur on leather footwears.  

For this purpose ,Supreme Crème de Luxe is even more effective ,because it has doubled the pigment in a regular shoe cream. With addition of Cedar Oil , this premium cream can revive any dried-out leather in no time.

Re-waxing the thread along the welt of shoes to give it protection

100 ml 
made in Germany

name: Collonil 1909 Supreme Crème de Luxe Medium Brown
description:
Extra pigment. For keeping the colour on shoes as it is ,choose cream slightly lighter. For developing patina ,choose slightly darker one.

As for Supreme Crème de Luxe, its texture is more creamy, compared to an ordinary shoe cream with jelly texture. It suggests there is no plasticizer, yet more oil concentration in the content keeping leather soft and supple.


100 ml 
Made in Germany

name: Collonil 1909 Supreme Crème de Luxe  Light Brown
description:
High-Gloss shine without polishing

Extra pigment. For preserving the colour on shoes as it is ,choose cream slightly lighter .For developing patina ,choose slightly darker one.

Re-waxing the thread along the welt of shoes to give it protection

100 ml 
Made in Germany

name: Collonil 1909 Supreme Crème de Luxe Burgundy
description:
High-Gloss shine without polishing

Extra pigment. For preserving the colour on shoes as it is ,choose cream slightly lighter .For developing patina ,choose slightly darker one.

Precious oils for deep-conditioning

Re-waxing the thread along the welt of shoes to give it protection

100 ml 
Made in Germany

name: Collonil 1909 Leather Cream
description:
Premium  cleaner and conditioner 

To be used on shoes or bags. Suitable for both Calf or Nappa leathers

It has natural solvent to clean, and more importantly to open up the pores of leather from polish. As a result, conditioner can act.
Featuring Cedar Oil as its main conditioner, which is also in Crème de Luxe from 1909 line.

Like Saphir Renovateur, but without the concern of darkening your shoes and greasy residue.

Conveniently with sponge applicator on tip to absorbs dirt , and to ensure very good cleaning results. Perfumed

Applying Collonil 1909 Leather Cream sparingly onto the uppers. Let dry. Buff with Collonil Polishing Cloth.
75ml
Made in Germany

name: Collonil 1909 Luxury Shoe Shine Valet Box
description:
Luxury Valet Box
Made of Beechwood and emboosed with a gold stamp of the name of Collonil 1909

Exclusively for organising products from 1909 Line

With a leather wrapped handle and metal hinges for opening and closing


1909 Kit includes:
Collonil 1909 Creme de luxe x4

Collonil 1909 Dauber x4

Collonil 1909 Leather Cream x1

Collonil 1909 Leather Lotion x1

Collonil 1909 Wax Polish x4

Collonil Horsehair Cleaning Brush x2

Collonil Goat Hair Polishing Brush x2

Collonil Polishing Cloth X2

Collonil 1909 Supreme Protect Spray x1

Collonil 1909 Supreme Wax Spray x1

name: Collonil Diamant Crème de Luxe
description:
Crème de Luxe of Diamond Collection is renowned in Japan for its deep-conditioning property, and is constantly rated best in the category. It has extra pigment and can waterproof to some degree. Favoured by many across the Pacific Ocean  for caring expensive leather goods.

Creamy texture. The cream spreads around in a way as if it knows where your finger tip going to be, getting there before you even make a movement of finger. Quite a experience. 

High-gloss shine without wax polish.

Perfumed with hints of Cedar

100 ml 
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Shoe Cream
description:
Shoe Cream from Collonil Classic Collection
Colour activating cream;conditions leathers and synthetics.

50ml/1.7oz
Made in Germany

name: Collonil 1909 Dauber
description:
Premium dauber

Exclusively for application of Collonil 1909 Supreme Crème de Luxe 

Also useful in removing debris in broguing, along gimping ,and along the welt

Ergonomic designed round head allows easy application of the cream without staining hands

 
Made in Germany

name: Collonil 1909 Goat Hair Brush
description:
Polishing Brush

Curved body with bevelled sides 

Densely packed with the softest Goat Hair bristles for the perfect finishing touch

While Horsehair Brush is handy for cleaning, its hard bristles might pit the surface of mirror-shine finish. So one should use different brushes for the separate purposes of cleaning and then polishing

15cm x 5cm x 4cm

Made in Germany

name: Collonil Horsehair Brush
description:
Cleaning brush

Packed with hard bristles of horsehair. Excellent in brushing off dust, debris and residue. Make sure shoes are clean before applying any shoe care product.

For polishing, we recommend Collonil Goat Hair Brush
Bristles in dark colour

18cm x 6cm x 5cm
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Suede Brush
description:
Collonil Suede Brush gently cleans and completely restore the nap at the same time with its crepe. On the side, has bristles for hard-to-reach spots.

Solely for light Suede

Made in Germany

name: Collonil Sheepskin Brush
description:
Combination Brush for robust suede leathers, namely Sheepskin and nubuck. 

Nylon bristles for cleaning. The brush thoroughly cleans away mud and tough dirt. May use Collonil Clean and Care to help speed up the cleaning process.

On the back with rubber cluster  for buffing as well as restoring the napped surface.

Welt cleaning wheel on the top end.

Not ideal for light suede leathers. 


Made in Germany

name: Collonil Waterstop Tube
description:
Care and waterproofing cream for smooth leather and high tech materials. With jojoba and almond oil to keep leather supple.

Collonil Waterstop Tube also revives and brightens colours.

First clean the surface of smooth leather. Apply sparingly onto the uppers, then let dry. Finally Polish with cloth.

75ml/2.54oz
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Ultra Cream
description:
Intensive reviving cream in tube 

Conditions fine and grained smooth leather through Lanolin. Ideal for Nappa leather.

Clean smooth leather. Apply a thin layer. Let dry. Polish with cloth.

50ml/1.7oz
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Colorit
description:
Collonil Colorit  is intensive colour reviving cream for smooth leather.

Pigment in cream form in a tube; For covering scuffs or minor touch-ups.

50ml/1.7oz
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Mild Lotion(Special Cleaner)
description:
Mild conditioning lotion for fine smooth leather, in particular Cordovan Shell. Gently cleans while conditioning at the same time.

Shake before use. Delicate leather needs carful handling. Therefore apply Collonil Mild without pressure, carefully and thinly with a soft cloth , spread evenly and polish lightly.

50ml/1.7oz
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Nubuck + Textiles
description:
Colour reviving and conditioning bottle for both Suede and textiles; With sponge applicator 

75ml/2.54oz
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Patent Polish
description:
Collonil Patent Polish is liquid colour reviver for the patent leather as well as a conditioner with softeners. 

Preserves and maintains the softness and flexibility of the finish. Protects ,yet brightens the special sheen of patent leathers.

Easy to use sponge applicator.

Before use, wipe shoes clean and allow to dry.Shake bottle and apply evenly.Allow to dry.


75ml/2.54oz
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Sole Protector
description:
Special waterproofing agent for leather soles

Prevents moisture working into the sole. With sponge applicator. Containing conditioning additives that can act against  premature sole abrasion, helping extend its life. 

Ensure soles are dry and roughed up with wear.Apply Sole Protector evenly over the bottom of the sole.Allow to dry.


75ml 
Made in Germany

name: Collonil 1909 Wax Polish
description:
Premium paste polish

Produces that blinding shine one only gets to see from a European bespoke shoemaker

Based on Beeswax, the highest quality wax in regard to brightness. And Beeswax is by nature soft and pliable. Even if applied on the vamp, it simply breaks away as shoes flex, unlike cheap polishes that will show wax cracking.

The key to high-gloss shine is that apply polish onto shoes in circular motion until misty paste completely covering the uppers. Then begin buffing with a moist cloth. From this point and on , there should be no more polish applied. Keep buffing until the display of the mirror-shine finish. Repeat the steps to make it  even shinier.

75ml  
Made in Germany

name: Dry Cleaner(For Stirpping Polish)
description:
The safest way to strip polish without causing detrimental effect on ,or striping the colour of, your Goodyear-Welted shoes. 

Cleaning up silicone residue; Removing wax-cracking; Restoring from over-waxing mist

Step1: Simply moisten a rag with Dry Cleaner;
Step2: Rub over the stain
Step3: Wipe off the residue 

110ml bottle 
Made in Canada

name: Collonil Star Gloss Cream(For Polishing)
description:
Collonil Star Gloss is German innovation at its best ,presenting a totally new way of polishing.It lends high shine to your shoes and  mildy conditions it at the same time. There is no silicone , so making long lasting suppleness possible.

Simply press its applicator on the uppers in circular motion to shine your fine shoes .Leather care couldn`t be easier.

75ml/2.4oz
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Mini Mobil
description:
Self Shine Sponge for smooth leather in a pocket sized box

Practical for use when traveling

Made in Germany

name: Collonil Colour Fashion Spray
description:
Brigthen the colour of fashionable leather goods even with combination of materials. Somewhat protect bags against dirt and moisture. Regular application intensifies the effect. Rough up suede.

Use only outdoors or in well-ventilated rooms. Spray them before use three times from a distance of about 20 cm. Leave for about 20 minutes so that the spray can penetrate deep into the materials. Regular application optimises the effect.

200ml 
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Polishing Cloth
description:
Chamois

For applying and polishing products from Collonil on smooth surfaces.

Velvet texture

100% Cotton

34cm x 34cm

Made in Germany

name: Collonil Stretch
description:
Softening foam for leather.

Collonil Stretch helps widen tight and uncomfortable spots in shoes.For Patent leather, the spray must be used on the inside of the shoe.


Spray Stretch on leather uppers while your foot is in the shoe.For Suede, nubuck ,and patent leather , spray on the inside of the shoe.

100ml
Made in Germany

name: Collonil Fresh
description:
Deodorant Shoe Spray

Lightly perfumed to eliminate odours. It also maintains a fresh cool feeling in your shoes

Spray Collonil Fresh evenly inside the shoe.Allow to dry. Spray  regularly to maintain freshness

100ml
Made in Germany
